Incident.Summary: Distribution of child pornography. Cyber tips #164296966, 164404568, 164501289

IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText:
Attachments
    -NCMEC Cybertips # 164296966, 164404568, 164501289
    -Google preservation letter
    -Signed Comcast subpoena
    -Two signed AT&T subpoenas 
    -Signed T-Mobile subpoena
    -Signed Breezeline subpoena
    -Signed Verizon subpoena
    -Verizon subscriber information
    -Verizon certification of records
    -AT&T declaration of records for the IP address
    -AT&T declaration of records for the phone number
    -AT&T subscriber information
    -Breezeline subscriber information
    -Breezeline records release cover
    -Breezeline declaration of authenticity
    -T-Mobile subscriber information
    -T-Mobile payment information
    -T-Mobile certification
    -Comcast subscriber information
    -Comcast cerfication

Narrative
On June 22, 2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section /Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTips # 164296966, 164404568, 164501289. The CyberTip, generated by Google, indicated that a subject uploading/possessing/distributing child pornography through the internet. The CyberTips were assigned to TFC Burnett for investigation.

The CyberTips provided the following information pertaining to the suspect:
Name: Sonny Tolbert
Mobile Phone: +12404128031 (Verified 12-14-2020 14:05:09 UTC)
Mobile Phone: +12405725345 (Verified 04-03-2022 09:10:36 UTC)
Date of Birth: 09-29-1958
Email Address: scrooded11@gmail.com (Verified)
Email Address: scrooged133@gmail.com
    
    TFC Burnett reviewed the three CyberTips and between them, there were 2,700 files. Within those files, there was 1,425 image files and 363 Gif (animated image) files depicting child pornography as it is defined by Maryland Law. Five randomly selected files are described below:

Cybertip #164296966

Filename #1: report_1041390494999988774.gif
Description: This file is a Gif (an animated image) of a prepubescent Caucasian infant child laying on a bed, while an adult male is aggressively forcing his erect penis into the infants mouth to perform fellatio. The infant appears to be in distress as the male holds down her head with his hand. Based on the size of the males hand holding the infants head and the physical characteristics, the infant appears to be between 4 months-10 months of age.
Upload:  2603:3003:5109:3a00:d4f1:a669:e282:3794 on 08-05-2019 at 19:02:53 UTC

Filename #2: report_12949004031983330524.jpg
Description: This image file depicts a nude prepubescent Caucasian infant child laying on top of a orange towel, with her legs spread, exposing her breasts and vagina. There is also an Caucasian adult males erect penis touching the infants mouth. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the infant appears to be between 8 months- 2 years of age.
Upload: 64.134.152.251 on 03-31-2019 at 21:18:30 UTC

Filename #3: report_13665655034674190985.gif
Description: This file is a Gif (an animated image) of a nude prepubescent Caucasian female child sitting on a bed looking at a magazine and then lays down, spreading her legs, exposing her vagina. A Caucasian male then vaginally penetrates the child with his erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be between 5-7 years of age.
Upload: 2600:1:f14a:1ffc:810d:c022:52e5:c7e on 12-13-2018 at 15:07:06 UTC

Filename #4: report_10201516820655762866.gif
Description: This file is a Giff (an animated image) of a prepubescent female child wearing a blue flowery dress and is laying on a bed. There is an adult male vaginally penetrating the females exposed vagina. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be between 5-8 years of age.
Upload: 2603:3003:5109:3a00:1c94:cfa4:6a63:a4de on 11-25-2019 at 13:55:04 UTC

Filename #5: report_8326272723764348878.gif
Description: This file is a Gif (an animated image) of a prepubescent Caucasian female child wearing a pink shirt and is nude from the waist down, laying on her stomach with her buttocks in the air. There is an adult males erect penis sodomizing the child’s anus. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be between 5-7 years of age.
Upload: 2603:3003:5109:3a00:9946:3571:58b:ea77 on 04-01-2019 at 11:08:24 UTC

    TFC Burnett conducted a query of the phone numbers through an open source database. The number (240-412-8031) is registered through T-Mobile and returns to a Tajia Upshur. The number (240-572-5345) is registered to AT&T.

    TFC Burnett observed there to be numerous IP addresses dating back from 2018. The most recent login/upload IP address (132.147.27.24) from 6/15/2023 is registered through Breezeline and geo-locates to Hollywood, Maryland. Below are some other IP addresses that were chosen to be sent for legal process. 

-"64.134.152.181" and "64.134.152.251" are registered through AT&T, geo-locate to the area of Palestine, Texas between March and August 2019. 
-"24.245.98.2", "24.245.104.67", "132.147.27.24" are registered through Breezeline, geo-locate to the area of Lexington Park, Maryland between November 2019- June 2023. 
-"2603:3003:5109:3a00:6507:b976:7685:ba36", "2603:3003:5109:3a00:1929:b45f:e185:28a1", "2603:3003:5109:3a00:7544:fa82:a237:d72b", "73.173.169.253", "73.173.169.248" are registered through Comcast, geo-locate to the area of Waldorf, Maryland between December 2018-September 2021. 
-"71.166.164.154", "108.18.160.4" are registered through Verizon, geo-locate to the area of Washington, DC between April 2019- November 2020. 

    TFC Burnett authored a subpoena request for the phone numbers through T-Mobile and AT&T, the IP addresses through Comcast, AT&T, Breezeline and Verizon. These which were submitted to the Howard County States Attorneys Office for endorsement. A preservation letter was also sent to Google for both email addresses to preserve the suspects accounts with the reference #37037897.

    On 6/30/2023, I received the signed Breezeline, T-Mobile, Verizon, Comcast and 2 AT&T subpoenas from the States Attorney's Office. 

    On 7/3/2023, I submitted the signed Comcast subpoena through the portal with the reference #REQ0018942. I also submitted the T-Mobile, 2 AT&T, Breezeline by email. 

    On 7/5/2023, I submitted the signed Verizon subpoena by email with the reference #23347750-0. I also received the AT&T subpoena return for the IP address with the below statement:

"After conducting a thorough search on all identifiers listed in the legal demand, AT&T was unable to identify any information responsive to the Legal Demand. IPs 64.134.152.181 & 64.134.152.251 are assigned for public WiFi internet access; not an individual customer, account, or computer. AT&T Internet Services is unable to identify an individual customer or account utilizing this wireless internet access venue IP address."

    I also received the AT&T subpoena for the phone number (240-572-5345) with the below information:

Case Status
    Open, investigation ongoing.

Attachments: 

    -NCMEC Cybertips #166388137, 166803638
    -Signed Google search warrant

Narrative:

    On 7/18/2023, the Honorable Judge Stanalonis with the St. Mary's Circuit Court signed a search warrant for the suspect Google accounts. I submitted the search warrant through the Google portal with the reference #38463446.

    On 7/19/2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section/Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTip # 166388137. The CyberTip, generated by Google, indicated that a subject uploading/possessing/distributing child pornography through the internet. 

    TFC Burnett reviewed the CyberTip and observed it to contain 14 image files depicting child pornography as it is defined by Maryland Law. 

    On 7/21/2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section/Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTip # 166803638. The CyberTip, generated by Google, indicated that a subject uploading/possessing/distributing child pornography through the internet. 

 CyberTips 166388137, 166803638provided the following information pertaining to the suspect, which was the same from the other 3 Cybertips:

Name: Sonny Tolbert
Mobile Phone: +12404128031 (Verified 12-14-2020 14:05:09 UTC)
Mobile Phone: +12405725345 (Verified 04-03-2022 09:10:36 UTC)
Date of Birth: 09-29-1958
Email Address: scrooded11@gmail.com (Verified)
Email Address: scrooged133@gmail.com

    TFC Burnett reviewed the CyberTip and observed it to contain 342 image files depicting child pornography as it is defined by Maryland Law. 

    TFC Burnett conducted a police search of the name and date of birth from the account , which returns to Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr. (W/M, DOB: 9/29/1958), located at 24862 Three Notch Rd, Hollywood, Md. 

Case open, investigation ongoing.

Attachments:

    -NCMEC Cybertips: 168504807, 168716716

Narrative:

    TFC Burnett conducted a police search of the name Ellis Tolbert and observed the below information: 

Possible Suspect:
        -Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr. (W/M, DOB: 9/29/1958)
Address:
        -24862 Three Notch Rd, Hollywood, Md 20636
Other people at the address: 
        -Mary Ellen Tolbert (W/F, DOB: 10/10/1961)
        -Ellis Eugene Tolbert 3rd (W/M, DOB: 6/5/1982)
Related Family: 
        -Sonny Eugene Tolbert (DOB: 5/1/1937)

    On 8/18/2023, at approximately 0650 hours, I conducted surveillance at 24862 Three Notch Rd, Hollywood, Md 20636 and observed a white Chevrolet Equinox bearing Maryland registration 5EF7044 in the driveway. This vehicle is registered to Mary Tolbert to that address. 

    On 8/21/2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section/Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTip # 168504807. The CyberTip, generated by Google, indicated that a subject uploading/possessing/distributing child pornography through the internet. 

    TFC Burnett reviewed the CyberTip and observed it to contain 2 image files depicting child pornography as it is defined by Maryland Law. 

    On 8/23/2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section/Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTip # 168716716. The CyberTip, generated by Google, indicated that a subject uploading/possessing/distributing child pornography through the internet. 

    TFC Burnett reviewed the CyberTip and observed it to contain 8 image files depicting child pornography as it is defined by Maryland Law. 

    On 8/23/2023, TFC Burnett also received the Google search warrant return with hundreds of folders to be downloaded. Currently, the folders are still being downloaded, but hundreds of files of child pornography have been viewed so far. Along with images of the suspect, Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr. who was positively identified by his Maryland driver's license photograph. There was also a picture of a document from MedStar Medical Group at St. Clements with the name of Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr., DOB: 9/29/1958 and a photo of the side of a silver sedan. 


Filename: TwTk5O-1fxij6w43wnde.gif
Description: This file is a gif (animated image) of a prepubescent Caucasian female child who is wearing a pink cartoon shirt and is nude from the waist down, laying ontop of a table. There is an adult male who is sodomizing the child's anus with his erect penis. The male then holds the child's legs apart and zooms into her vagina/anus area. Based on the size, physical characteristics, and the child is devoid of pubic hair, the child appears to be 5-7 years of age. 

Filename: 1 (6)-1epnj82hlxx1u.gif
Description: This file is a gif (animated image) of a nude prepubescent Caucasian female child who is kneeling down, performing fellatio on an adult male's erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 6-8 years of age. 

Filename: 4 (14)-1epno634elbwi.gif
Description: This file is a gif (animated image) of a nude prepubescent Hispanic female child laying on a bed, performing fellatio on an adult male's erect penis. While another adult male is penetrating the child's vagina with his erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 6-8 years of age. 

Filename: 4 (11)-1epnjxrobeo0i.gif
Description: This file is a gif (animated image) of a nude prepubescent Caucasian female child laying on a bed, and a nude adult male sitting down next to the bed, over top of the child. The male is seen masturbating his penis while he is rubbing the child's vagina with his fingers. The male then pulls the child close to him and ejaculates on her stomach and vagina area. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 2-4 years of age. 

Filename: 26gmoh-1fdtle51nl5mq.gif
Description: This file is a gif (animated image) of a nude prepubescent Caucasian female child laying on her stomach on a bed. An adult male is sodomizing the child's anus with his erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 3-6 years of age. 

    On 8/25/2023, at approximately 0455 hours, I conducted surveillance at 24862 Three Notch Rd, Hollywood, Md 20636 and observed the white Chevrolet Equinox and a silver Toyota Corolla bearing Maryland registration, 9CX2543 in the driveway. The Toyota is registered to Ellis Tolbert Jr. to that address. I also observed a light on the left side of the house and then at 0500 hours there was another light that came on. At approximately 0505 hours, one light went out. At approximately 0509 hours, the Toyota started and the vehicle left the driveway and headed northbound on Route 235. 

    On 8/28/2023, at approximately 0445 hours, I conducted surveillance at 24862 Three Notch Rd, Hollywood, Md 20636 and observed both vehicles in the driveway. Based on where I was sitting, I could not see the full house. At approximately 0525 hours, I observed the Toyota start and leave, heading northbound on Route 235. I followed the vehicle and observed it to continue into Charles County, Maryland. 

    On 9/1/2023, I learned the silver Toyota Corlla, bearing Maryland registration 9CX2543 was stopped at approximately 0518 hours for an equipment violation.  The vehicle was stopped in the area of northbound Rt. 235 and South Sandgates Road.  The vehicle was being operated by Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr. (W/M, DOB: 9/29/1958).  This information was verified by the operators Maryland drivers license.

Case open, investigation ongoing.

ATTACHMENTS:

    -Operational Plan
    -Threat Assessment

    -Signed vehicle Search and Seizure Warrant

    -Maryland State Police Property Records: P-344637
    -Lab request (Form 36)
    -Lab incident report
    -Polygraph examination report

PROPERTY OWNER/ACCUSED:

   Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr. (W/M, DOB: 9/29/1958) “Sonny”

NARRATIVE:

    On September 6, 2023, the Honorable Judge Chesser with the St. Mary’s County District Court signed a residential (24862 Three Notch Road, Hollywood, Maryland 20636), body (Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr.), and vehicle (silver Toyota Corolla, MD registration: 9CX2543) search warrants.

    On September 7, 2023, at approximately 0450 hours, members of the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Unit (MSP CCU) of the Internet Crimes Against Children Taskforce, and the MSP Leonardtown Barrack executed a residential search and seizure warrant at 24862 Three Notch Road, Hollywood, Maryland 20636, for evidence relating to child pornography violations. No force was used to make entry into the residence. Three individuals were located inside of the residence, Ellis Eugene Tolbert Jr. (W/M, DOB: 9/29/1958), Mary Ellen Tolbert (W/F, DOB: 10/10/1961), and Ellis Eugene Tolbert 3rd (W/M, DOB: 6/5/1982).
   
    The forthcoming interview was recorded on a departmentally issued Sony IC Recorder. The following interview is not a complete and exact transaction, but mere synopsis. For a clearer and more concise dissertation of the interview, refer to the recording in the case file.

    At approximately 0503 hours, TFC Burnett and TFC Crowe interviewed Ellis Tolbert Jr. “Sonny” in an unmarked State Police vehicle, in the driveway of the residence. Sonny was advised of his Miranda Rights which he free and voluntarily waived and indicated by signing the Advice of Miranda Rights (Form 180). Sonny provided some contact information, (240-572-5345, sonnytolbert42@gmail.com).

    During the interview, Sonny explained that he had the email (scrooded11@gmail.com) and used it to look at pornography, and it was cut off a couple of months ago because he was looking at child pornography. But the other email (scrooged133@gmail.com) he still utilizes for pornography. Sonny explained in 2018, child pornography would pop up on his phone when he was looking at nude beaches and that was how he became curious about child pornography. Sonny advised he had about 3 or 4 pictures of child pornography. Then he said he had a lot (about 30) files of child pornography years ago and got rid of them about a month ago. Sonny then advised he masturbated to child pornography about a week or so ago.

    Sonny advised he has Twitter, Reddit, Facebook, Instagram accounts which he could not provide the usernames at this time. Sonny only said that he had child pornography on his phone, not in any other account.

    At approximately 0549 hours, we interviewed Mary Tolbert in the same unmarked State Police vehicle, in the driveway of the residence. During the conversation, Mary advised she did not know who would have child pornography in the house. But she believed it to be Ellis Tolbert Jr. over Ellis Tolbert 3rd. Mary advised they have a granddaughter who is 7 months old and a step-grandson who is 19 years old. She also said she has about 17 nieces/nephews. Mary explained that none of them really come over to the house. Mary provided her password to her phone and nothing was found within in it.

    At approximately 0600 hours, we interviewed Ellis Eugene Tolbert 3rd in the same unmarked State Police vehicle, in the driveway of the residence. Ellis advised that he did not know who would have child pornography within the house. Ellis provided his passwords to his devices and nothing was found within in them.

    During the interview, investigators searched the residence for any electronic devices of interest. Cpl. Fitzgerald conducted an on-scene preview of a couple devices and observed child pornography. The above listed items were seized for a further forensic examination.

    Sonny agreed to take a polygraph examination for any hands-on offenses with minors. Sonny drove himself to the MSP Prince Frederick Barrack, where Sgt. Farfan conducted a polygraph examination. Sonny later passed with no deception to sexual contact with children.

    After consultation with St. Mary’s County Assistant States Attorney Sowls, it was determined that Ellis Tolbert Jr. will be charged at a later date, once the full forensic extraction of the devices is completed.
    
    The devices were transported to the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Unit temporary storage and held on a Chain of Custody (Form 67) and Property Record (P-344637).

    On 9/11/2023, I submitted a lab request for the forensic examination of the devices that were seized. 

    On 9/12/2023, the Honorable Judge Chesser signed the Maryland State Police residence, body and vehicle Search Warrant Inventory Report and Return (Form 98) and the Maryland State Police residence, body and vehicle Evidence Inventory (Form 98A). The Post Search Warrant Survey (Form 40) was completed.

OPEN, PENDING FORENSICS
